body_html:
Asking for some comments: TF is now hiding all protobuf symbols, this makes it annoying when I want to write a custom op which uses protobuf symbols. It seems like I have to find the version of protobuf that tensorflow is linked to, and link to it when compiling the op. (some discussions: tensorpack/tensorpack#221 (comment))
Can we export protobuf symbols as well?
body_text:

Can we export protobuf symbols as well?
body:
Asking for some comments: TF is now hiding all protobuf symbols, this makes it annoying when I want to write a custom op which uses protobuf symbols. It seems like I have to find the version of protobuf that tensorflow is linked to, and link to it when compiling the op. (some discussions: https://github.com/ppwwyyxx/tensorpack/issues/221#issuecomment-292654997)
Can we export protobuf symbols as well?
